name: Build New Feature
description: Perform build new feature

name: Improve User Experience
description: You redesign user flows and interfaces to make your product easier to use and more intuitive

name: Fix Critical Bugs
description: Your team drops everything to fix bugs that are causing user complaints and support tickets

name: Performance Optimization
description: You optimize slow queries, add caching, and improve page load times to reduce bounce rates

name: Add Mobile Support
description: You build a mobile app or responsive web version to reach users on their phones

name: Implement Analytics
description: You add tracking to understand how users actually use your product and where they drop off

name: User Onboarding Flow
description: You create a guided onboarding experience that helps new users understand your product's value

name: A/B Testing Framework
description: You set up A/B testing infrastructure to make data-driven decisions about product changes

name: API Development
description: You build APIs that allow third-party integrations and enable partnerships

name: Accessibility Improvements
description: You make your product accessible to users with disabilities, expanding your addressable market

name: Internationalization
description: You translate your product and adapt it for international markets to expand globally

name: Product Documentation
description: You write clear documentation that helps users and reduces support burden

name: Beta Testing Program
description: You recruit beta users to test new features before public launch and gather feedback

name: Feature Flags System
description: You implement feature flags so you can roll out features gradually and roll back if needed

name: Social Media Campaign
description: You create and run social media campaigns across platforms to drive awareness and signups

name: Influencer Partnership
description: You partner with influencers who can authentically promote your product to their audience

name: Content Marketing
description: You create blog posts, videos, and other content that attracts potential customers organically

name: Paid Advertising
description: You run paid ads on Google, Facebook, or other platforms to acquire customers

name: Email Marketing
description: You send targeted email campaigns to nurture leads and re-engage inactive users

name: SEO Optimization
description: You optimize your website and content to rank higher in search results and get organic traffic

name: Webinar Series
description: You host educational webinars that position you as an expert and generate qualified leads

name: Community Building
description: You build a community around your product where users help each other and become advocates

name: Referral Program
description: You create a referral program that incentivizes existing users to bring in new customers

name: PR Campaign
description: You pitch journalists and get press coverage that builds credibility and drives signups

name: Trade Show Participation
description: You attend industry conferences and trade shows to network and generate leads

name: Partnership Marketing
description: You form marketing partnerships with complementary companies to reach new audiences

name: Video Marketing
description: You create video content that explains your product and gets shared on social media

name: Podcast Sponsorship
description: You sponsor podcasts that your target customers listen to, reaching them in their natural habitat

name: Upgrade Infrastructure
description: You upgrade servers, databases, and hosting to handle more traffic and improve reliability

name: Security Audit
description: You hire security experts to audit your systems and fix vulnerabilities before hackers find them

name: Implement CI/CD
description: You automate your deployment pipeline so code goes from commit to production faster and safer

name: Database Optimization
description: You optimize slow database queries and add indexes to improve performance and reduce costs

name: API Rate Limiting
description: You implement rate limiting to prevent abuse and ensure fair usage of your API

name: Monitoring System
description: You set up monitoring and alerting so you know when things break before users complain

name: Load Testing
description: You test your system under heavy load to find breaking points before real traffic hits

name: Backup System
description: You implement automated backups so you can recover quickly if data gets corrupted or deleted

name: Code Review Process
description: You establish code review practices so bugs get caught before they reach production

name: Automated Testing
description: You write automated tests that run on every deployment to catch regressions early

name: Cloud Migration
description: You migrate your infrastructure to the cloud to improve scalability and reduce costs

name: Microservices Architecture
description: You break your monolithic application into microservices so teams can work independently

name: Container Orchestration
description: You containerize your applications and use orchestration tools to manage deployments at scale

name: Service Mesh
description: You implement a service mesh to manage communication between microservices securely

name: Strategic Partnership
description: You negotiate partnerships with larger companies that can help you reach new customers

name: Pitch to Investors
description: You prepare and deliver pitches to investors to raise funding for growth

name: Customer Discovery
description: You interview potential customers to understand their problems before building solutions

name: B2B Sales Outreach
description: You reach out to potential B2B customers through cold emails, LinkedIn, and networking events

name: Channel Partnerships
description: You partner with resellers and distributors who can sell your product to their customers

name: Enterprise Sales
description: You pursue large enterprise deals that require long sales cycles but bring significant revenue

name: Strategic Alliances
description: You form strategic alliances with companies that complement your product offering

name: Investor Relations
description: You maintain relationships with investors through regular updates and board meetings

name: Customer Success Program
description: You create a customer success program to help users get value and reduce churn

name: Sales Team Building
description: You hire and train a sales team to scale your revenue beyond what founders can do alone

name: Market Expansion
description: You expand into new geographic markets or customer segments to grow revenue

name: Distribution Partnerships
description: You partner with companies that can distribute your product through their channels

name: Strategic Acquisition
description: You acquire a smaller company to gain their technology, team, or customer base

name: Joint Ventures
description: You form joint ventures with other companies to pursue opportunities neither could do alone

name: Hire Developer
description: You recruit and hire developers to build features faster and improve product quality

name: Hire Marketer
description: You hire marketers to scale your customer acquisition beyond what you can do yourself

name: Improve Processes
description: You document and improve internal processes to make your team more efficient

name: Team Building
description: You organize team events and activities to build stronger relationships and improve morale

name: Office Setup
description: You set up a physical office space or improve your remote work infrastructure

name: Remote Work Infrastructure
description: You invest in tools and systems that enable effective remote work and collaboration

name: HR Policies
description: You establish HR policies and procedures to protect the company and support employees

name: Employee Training
description: You invest in training programs to help employees develop skills and grow with the company

name: Vendor Management
description: You negotiate better terms with vendors and manage relationships to reduce costs

name: Supply Chain Optimization
description: You optimize your supply chain to reduce costs and improve delivery times

name: Quality Assurance
description: You establish QA processes to ensure product quality before releases reach customers

name: Customer Support
description: You build a customer support system to help users and reduce churn from frustration

name: Legal Compliance
description: You ensure your company complies with regulations to avoid fines and legal issues

name: Risk Management
description: You identify and mitigate business risks before they become crises that threaten the company

name: Budget Review
description: You review your budget and spending to identify areas where you can cut costs or invest more

name: Cost Cutting
description: You identify and eliminate unnecessary expenses to extend your runway

name: Pricing Strategy
description: You analyze the market and adjust pricing to maximize revenue without losing customers

name: Revenue Optimization
description: You optimize your revenue streams by improving conversion rates and finding new monetization

name: Financial Planning
description: You create financial forecasts and plans to ensure you have enough cash to reach milestones

name: Tax Optimization
description: You structure your finances to minimize tax burden legally and maximize after-tax cash

name: Invoice Management
description: You streamline invoicing and collections to get paid faster and reduce outstanding receivables

name: Expense Tracking
description: You implement systems to track expenses so you know where every dollar is going

name: Financial Reporting
description: You create financial reports that help you make informed decisions and satisfy investors

name: Cash Flow Management
description: You manage the timing of cash inflows and outflows to avoid running out of money

name: Investment Strategy
description: You decide how to invest excess cash to generate returns while maintaining liquidity

name: Credit Line
description: You secure a line of credit as a safety net for unexpected expenses or cash flow gaps

name: Equity Financing
description: You raise capital by selling equity to investors in exchange for funding to grow

name: Debt Refinancing
description: You refinance existing debt to get better terms and reduce interest payments

name: Market Research
description: You research your target market to understand size, trends, and customer needs

name: User Research
description: You interview and observe users to understand how they actually use your product

name: Technology Research
description: You research new technologies and tools that could improve your product or reduce costs

name: Competitive Analysis
description: You analyze competitors to understand their strengths, weaknesses, and positioning

name: User Interviews
description: You conduct one-on-one interviews with users to understand their problems and needs

name: Surveys and Polls
description: You send surveys to gather quantitative feedback from a large number of users

name: Data Analysis
description: You analyze user behavior data to identify patterns and opportunities for improvement

name: Trend Analysis
description: You analyze industry trends to anticipate changes and position your product accordingly

name: Technology Evaluation
description: You evaluate new technologies to decide if they're worth adopting or if they're just hype

name: Customer Segmentation
description: You segment your customers into groups to target them with relevant messaging and features

name: Market Validation
description: You validate that there's real demand for your product before investing heavily in building it

name: Product-Market Fit
description: You measure and improve product-market fit to ensure you're building something people want

name: User Personas
description: You create detailed user personas to guide product decisions and marketing messaging

name: Market Sizing
description: You calculate the total addressable market to understand your growth potential

name: Rapid Expansion
description: You aggressively expand into new markets or launch new products, risking overextension

name: Major Pivot
description: You pivot your product or business model based on learning that your original idea won't work

name: Acquisition Attempt
description: You attempt to acquire another company, risking integration challenges and cultural clashes

name: All-In Marketing Blitz
description: You spend heavily on marketing in a high-risk, high-reward attempt to rapidly acquire customers

name: Major Technology Rewrite
description: You rewrite major parts of your technology stack, risking delays and introducing new bugs

name: International Expansion
description: You expand internationally, facing language barriers, regulations, and cultural differences

name: Competitive Attack
description: You aggressively compete with a rival, potentially starting a price war or feature race

name: High-Stakes Partnership
description: You form a high-stakes partnership that could make or break your company

name: Major Hiring Spree
description: You hire many people quickly, risking culture dilution and burn rate increase

name: Product Line Expansion
description: You launch new products beyond your core offering, risking focus and resource dilution

name: Market Disruption
description: You attempt to disrupt an established market with an innovative approach, facing resistance

name: Regulatory Challenge
description: You challenge existing regulations or operate in a gray area, risking legal consequences

name: Major Investment
description: You make a major investment in infrastructure or technology that could transform the company

name: Strategic Bet
description: You make a strategic bet on an unproven direction that could pay off big or fail spectacularly
